title: Dedicated page
desc: For each of your businesses, it will have a dedicated space page with a unique link. Your customers can directly go there to submit a text or a video testimonial.

title: Embeddable Wall of love
desc: It's a page to show all your selected testimonials. You can even add the whole wall to your own site with an iframe embed code.

title: Dashboard page
desc: You will have a dashboard page to manage all your spaces. You can add/update/remove the space as you want.

title: Video download
desc: You will have the access to download the video in the MP4 format with its original resolution.

title: Custom color
desc: You can add a custom color for buttons to make it more fit into your own brand.

title: Dark or light theme
desc: You can choose dark or light theme for the product page to better fit your website style.
